description:
26% of the top 1 million eCommerce sites use Magento, more than any other eCommerce software and we'll show you how to get started with Magento.

No prior knowledge of Magento is required and we share with you the why and the how to everything you need to know to get started using Magento.

In this introductory course you'll meet your two instructors that will be holding your hand through the whole process, Matt Ogborne & Dave Furness.

We believe that Magento doesn't need to be nerdy or for the tech-geeks only.

Magento is dead easy to setup and use day to day. We'll show you how, all in Plain English.

You'll learn all of the following & more in this course:

  • What the different version of Magento are
  • Why you want to use Magento Community Edition over Magento Go
  • The history behind Magento
  • Why you need decent web hosting for Magento
  • How to set up Magento web hosting if you're in the USA or UK & Europe
  • How to install Magento Community Edition the EASY way
  • Where to obtain support for you & your Magento website

This course leads onto part 2 "Getting Started with Your Magento Website" where we'll show you around Magento for the first time, how to set up customised email addresses, an FTP account, the basic settings you need to add and much more.

With 100% video content, you can follow us along in your own Magento system.

If you've read this far, hit the "Start Learning Now" button and get started,

We'll see you on the inside,

Matt & Dave
title: Introduction to Magento Community Edition For Beginners
